svg.title: Test that changing conditional processing attributes dynamically elements while redraw is suspended is honored
svg.script: function f() { var svg = document.documentElement; svg.suspendRedraw(10000); setTimeout(function() { document.getElementById("r").setAttribute("requiredFeatures", "http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/feature#Gradient"); svg.unsuspendRedrawAll(); setTimeout(function() { svg.removeAttribute("class"); }, 1); }, 1); }
